title: Food Mania:
description: Developed a comprehensive online food Ordering website, Food Mania, which enables users to seamlessly browse, order, and manage food items.

title: Authentication and Encryption of Data:
description: Implemented website which securely verify user identities and protect sensitive information from unauthorized users accessing useful information.

title: Temperature Converter:
description: Developed a user-friendly temperature converter Site that allows users to input a temperature in either Fahrenheit or Celsius, convert it, and display the result in the appropriate unit.

title: Weather App:
description: Developed a weather site that provides next 7-days forecast and displays current weather details including temperature, wind speed, Pressure and more.

title: Portfolio:
description: Developed a responsive and interactive personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and achievements.

title: To Do List:
description: Developed a dynamic To-Do List application with features that allow users to add, edit, and delete tasks.

title: Landing Page:
description: Designed and developed an engaging and high-converting landing page for a product launch.
